price: Haala gaaddisni ishee isaan irratti gadi dhihoo, firiiwwan ishees isaaniif laaffifamuu laaffifamteen (jannata seenu).
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
